message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.CR, cs.SY. 

The paper discusses a framework for robust policy learning in the presence of unknown adversaries in cyber-physical systems using deep reinforcement learning. This topic is closely related to machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) as it involves developing algorithms for autonomous agents. The paper also discusses the use of a supervisory master agent to detect the presence of the adversary, which falls under the category of robotics (cs.RO). Additionally, the paper addresses concerns around safety and security, which is related to computer security and cryptography (cs.CR). Finally, the paper discusses simulation results using popular OpenAI Gym environments, which falls under the category of systems and control (cs.SY).
